subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If all goes well with the rest of his rehabilitation assignment, Moises Alou, who has not played since straining his left quadriceps May 12, should rejoin the Mets next week.
snippet: If all goes well with the rest of his rehabilitation assignment, Moises Alou, who has not played since straining his left quadriceps May 12, should rejoin the Mets next week.
